text:
Hello, 

I have enhanced PVCS task:
- addied ability to get to any directory, not only to workspace,
- user name/password,
- Bill of Materials - relative file names and revision numbers to xml file with 
ablity to apply a stylesheet.

Styling requires xalan.jar
---
Best regards, Pavel Vlasov.

text: We have had a vote to deprecate and remove the tasks related to commercial SCM systems, including PVCS. Thus this bug report is no longer relevant.
